snippet: Talks aimed at forming a coalition government ended, and an Islamic State video called on Muslims to revolt against President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
abstract: Efforts by Turkey's dominant party to form new coalition government officially fail, and Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan calls for new election; move would mean positioning of an interim government at time when threat from Islamic State is rising.
lead_paragraph: Talks aimed at forming a coalition government ended, and an Islamic State video called on Muslims to revolt against President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.

headline.main: Elections Seem Likely in Turkey as ISIS Threat Rises
headline.print_headline: Elections Seem Likely in Turkey as ISIS Threat Rises

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
